channel.title: [RSC] Rune Gods / custom gambling
channel.description:
[size=10pt]This is noobscape v3 with a few edits[/size]
Quests: Romeo & Juliet Quest. Druidic Ritual Quest. Witch's Potion Quest. Doric's Quest. Imp Catcher Quest. Sheep Shearer Quest. Cook's Assistant Quest.
Features: Custom gambling cards to gamble for items Custom client installer Gambling. PvP tournament. Exp 100x Quest Tab. Combat Tab. Kills and Deaths in combat tab. K/D Ratio in combat tab. Killing Spree in combat tab. Killing Spree Rank in combat tab.
Website: [url=http://runegods.servegame.com]http://runegods.servegame.com[/url]
Screen Shots: [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/290vfhj.jpg[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/iemk1y.jpg[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/xcmww2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/nxndyq.jpg[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/25yyv4p.jpg[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2rm5qgi.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2q1bgbd.jpg[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/70jdde.jpg[/img]

played it for a bit but he keeps rebooting server and my accounts get stuck … everytime for about an hour , he claims its beacause i use 2 screens however i use 2-3 screens in all servers and never had that issue

Read full topic

item.title: [RSC] Rune Gods / custom gambling
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:10, topic:516653”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=634914.msg4285041#msg4285041 date=1366228409]
Why would anyone in their right mind play a server owned by someone named, “EliteHacker”? Let alone run the executable installer…

[quote author=imthenull link=topic=634914.msg4284917#msg4284917 date=1366218522]

[quote author=tigerclan link=topic=634914.msg4284801#msg4284801 date=1366206763]

is this using easyrsc nonhashed password text file system?

does it really matter, as md5 is easy to crack why does it matter jw?

of course it matters. who wants to register on a site that uses raw passwords or md5? Nobody should have access to user passwords, including administrators

edit: heres a valid reason

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[/quote]prs06 used sha1 and a salt, yet someone still cracked all the passwords
[/quote]SHA1 is just as bad as MD5… You should be using one from the SHA2 family.
[/quote]Anything from the SHA2 family still aren’t meant to store passwords.

EDIT: Just to add though, they are better than SHA1/MD5.[/quote]Are you stupid? That’s one of their primary applications…

Read full topic

yeah the algorithms are easily accessible in php/java and a good SHA256/SHA512 hash with a random salt is sufficient
